user.biography: A husband, father, actor, director, and a climate justice and renewable energy advocate with an eye out for love and hope. Please, enjoy my photos.

node.text:
The last remaining forest giants in British Columbia are on Indigenous lands and have been taken care of since time immemorial. They are essential in the fight against climate change. They keep the air we breathe and the water we drink clean. Why won’t Premier Horgan, Minister Conroy, and the NDP protect them?
Demand they do the right thing and defer logging in ALL at-risk old growth forests in B.C by…
👀  Watching and sharing this video
✍️ Signing the petition: http://bit.ly/old-growth (or link in my bio)
Together we can protect the last of these incredible and essential giants.

node.title: Protect Old Growth Forests in British Columbia

node.text:
Take the time to listen to @gloriawalton of @100isnow. This was from last week’s #SkollWF, but is a message we all need to remember moving forward: climate justice & racial justice are one in the same.

Watch the whole conversation here: youtu.be/XjDDC8W76-I

node.text: Please watch this new video I made with youth from Standing Rock & my friend @shailenewoodley & join us in urging @POTUS @JoeBiden & @VP @KamalaHarris to #StandWithStandingRock & #ShutDownDAPL. We are in a #ClimateEmergency. We must respect tribal sovereignty, stop massive fossil fuel infrastructure and transition to 100% renewable energy now for our children & the next 7 generations. Mni Wiconi! Water is life!

Please listen to these powerful words from @Anisa_Nandaula as she calls to people everywhere to step forward, not be silent, and to #ChooseToChallenge. 

We can choose to challenge and call out gender bias and inequality and choose to celebrate women’s achievements. From challenge comes change. ⁠#IWD2021 ✊🏻

node.text:
Thank you, Hollywood Foreign Press Association for this honor, for seeing I Know This Much Is True early, and keeping it in your hearts and minds all this time. I am humbled by this acknowledgment.
___

Closed Captions: 
Thank you Hollywood Foreign Press, Thank you HBO. Thank you, Production Team.
I want to thank my cast mates, this is as much yours as it mine. Thank you to the crew and craftspeople who carried us with artistry and grit. Derek Cianfrance, my brother, my director, my partner, thank you for making Humanity your highest ideal always, the good the bad and the ugly. You are one of the greats and I would know. Thank you, Wally Lamb, for this beautiful story of Twins, fractured in heart and mind; for the story of America, her brokenness and promise...forgiveness, healing, and integration

At 54 years old, it is my humble belief that what will give all this sadness and loss we have lived through meaning, is our common humanity. What connects us, is greater than what keeps us apart, and the more we include each other and see and hear each other, the faster we will heal our broken hearts and minds. We have a dying Mother, like the one in our story. She is Mother Earth. We must come into balance with her and honor her so she will heal. 

Let’s be courageous together and turn the page on the cruel past of our nation. The good news is inclusion and justice, and care for our Mother is breaking out everywhere. The Godly light of decency is breaking through the hideous dark storm we have lived through. We are all in this together. WE are the ones we have been WAITING for.

node.text:
Dear @potus @joebiden, please listen to the pleas of our young Native people who are speaking for the next 7 generations. Four years ago these young Native people ran for their lives. They are doing it again today. 

We still #StandwithStandingRock and we demand you shut down the Dakota Access Pipeline.  #DAPL continues to operate illegally without the proper permits putting the Standing Rock Sioux nation at risk. It’s time to #BuildBackFossilFree.

node.text:
Sound ON. Check it out, I’m animated. And I’m fighting to SMASH air pollution, climate change and environmental injustice in a video supporting Electric Vehicles for @electricforall. Honored to be featured alongside @chloebennet, @favianna1, Mayor @leon_de_huron, Mama Linda and Miss Jackie. With more than 60 models now available, including minivans and SUVs; 2021 is going to be a turning point for Electric Vehicles. And they start under $20k. You can compare them all and find one that’s right for you at electricforall.org.

And big props to @ayonimusic for the great vocals on the song.

#ElectricForAll #40MillionReasons #LetsVeloz #ev #electricvehicle #electriccars #zeroemissions  #climatechange #climatejustice #savetheplanet #gogreen #California #sponsored #PoweredByVeloz

node.text:
I am honored to stand with the hundreds of #WaterProtectors who are fighting for the water, land, and future of our communities and our planet. 

We have joined together to fight against Enbridge, a foreign oil company that is draining our lakes, jailing water protectors, destroying sacred rice beds, endangering Indigenous women, and ruining our climate. 💧🤝🌎 Now we need your help! 

Join us to call on @POTUS and @USACEHQ’s Jaime Pinkham to stand with us, honor the Tribal treaties, take bold climate action, and immediately intervene to #StopLine3 - a toxic tar sands pipeline. 

Check out our latest ad in @nytimes & visit the link in my bio to take action! 

Photo credit to @nedahnessgreene

node.text: Water is life. But during a statewide drought & water shortages across the country, Enbridge wants to drain 5B gallons of water to build the Line 3 pipeline through the heart of Anishinaabe territory. Join me as I call on @POTUS & @USACEHQ to #StopLine3 (use the link in my bio to learn more about how you can help)

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Mark Ruffalo on July 12, 2021 tagging @black.widow. May be an image of 2 people and indoor.

node.text: Congratulations to my birthday twin, Scarlett Johansson & everyone a part of #BlackWidow for a great opening weekend! Have you seen the film yet? No spoilers, but let me know what you thought of the movie 🕷

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Mark Ruffalo on July 07, 2021. May be a closeup of 1 person and outdoors.

node.text:
Communities across the country mobilized to get @POTUS elected, and we’ve  joined forces once again to demand he follow through on his campaign promises.

Today we stand with the hundreds of water protectors like Sasha Beaulieu of Red Lake camp, Taysha Martineau from camp Migizi, and Nedahness Greene who goes wherever she is needed to stop #Line3 in Northern MN. They are a part — at the heart — of a movement that is growing in spirit and power for the future we all want to create.

Today, more than 200 actors, musicians, environmentalists, donors, and allied activists (including @100isnow grantees, @giniwcollective, @honortheeearth, & RISE Coalition) to deliver a letter to the White House calling on the Biden administration and the @USACEHQ to respect Indigenous and Tribal rights and to take bold climate action, and #StopLine3 before it is too late.

Read our letter with the link in my bio and join the fight to protect our communities and our climate.

Photo credit to @nedahnessgreene.

node.text: Communities across the country mobilized to get @POTUS elected, and we’ve joined forces again to demand he follow through on his campaign promises. Read our letter (link in bio) calling on @joebiden & @USACEHQ to respect Indigenous rights, act on climate, & #StopLine3.

node.text: Learn more at the link in my bio on how you can take action and join us in the fight to #StopLine3.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Mark Ruffalo on June 26, 2021. May be an image of 3 people and text that says '#STOPLINE3 Conversations with a Water Protector Bringing awareness to the native lands in danger of climate devastation and water pollution caused by the line 3 pipeline PROJECT CHOREANTH @MarkRuffalo Co-Founder The Solutions Project @WinonaLaDuke Executive Director Honor The Earth @GloriaWalton CEO President The Solutions Project Join the conversation June 26 at 1:30 pm ET, IG Live @markruffalo'.

node.text:
For too long Indigenous communities have carried the weight of our addiction to oil & gas despite their objections. We MUST show up for Indigenous, Black, communities of color & allies fighting to protect water, food sources, ancestral land, the sky and their bodies from toxic pollution and climate change. 

TODAY (June 26th) at 1:30pm ET, join me here on Instagram Live with @100isnow’s CEO & President, @GloriaWalton alongside @WinonaLaDuke, executive director, and co-founder of @HonorTheEarth, for a conversation with a water protector directly impacted by the pipelines, who are fighting for our water, and for our futures.

#StopLine3 #BuildBackFossilFree #WaterIsLife #ClimateChange #ActOnClimate #HonortheTreaties #TarSands #BuildBackFossilFree #riverlife #ginamccarthy
